title: World War II Valor in the Pacific National Monument: Dive Through History on the USS Arizona
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Video Archive     Dive Through History on the USS Arizona                Dive Through History on the USS Arizona                         The Stern of the USS Arizona The National Park Service dive team takes you to the stern of the ‪‎USS Arizona‬ and explains what happened to that part of the ship during the attack, as well as the area where the Arizona's crane was salvaged.  Duration:1 minute, 39 seconds                                The Structure of the USS Arizona A National Park Service diver talks about the structure of the USS Arizona.  Duration:6 minutes, 22 seconds
